message: I propose dividing the money in a 7:3 ratio. This allows us both to have a reasonable share while considering the decrease in value over time.
I propose a 6:4 split in my favor.  This is a fairer distribution given the inflation, which will benefit me more than you in the long run.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. Given the inflation, it's important to ensure we both receive a comparable value.
